report_title: KJET Muranga County Application Ranking and Evaluation

applications.applicant_name: Kigoro Dairy Farmers cooperative society limited

S1_Registration_Track_Record_5%.reason: Very good scale (>1000 members) and positive membership growth.

S2_Financial_Position_20%.reason: Very high turnover (>174.9M KES) indicating significant market presence.

S3_Market_Demand_Competitiveness_20%.reason: Strong B2B focus (72%) shows reliable contract market. Applicant shows detailed understanding of competitors and success factors.

S4_Business_Proposal_Viability_25%.reason: Clear problem statement and a detailed plan for critical equipment investment.

S5_Value_Chain_Alignment_10%.reason: Excellent role: Involved in high-value addition (e.g., yogurt, pasteurization) or industrial processing.

S6_Inclusivity_Sustainability_20%.reason: Inclusivity: High female membership (64%) or woman-owned status.. Sustainability: Strong commitment to renewable energy (solar/biogas) and/or advanced waste/water management.
